messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] create something/sick kids
messages.messageBody:
>From: "Annette Naake" <naake1999@...>

<<On Saturday I "created" a big pot of chicken soup. The steamy broth,
extra fluid and vitamins from the veggies and chicken still add up to the
best way I know of to hurry a cold on its way...>>


I did that on Wed. and unfortunately my kids when sick don't have much of an
appetite to get enough into them to do much good. :(

Mary B

On Saturday I "created" a big pot of chicken soup. The steamy broth, extra
fluid and vitamins from the veggies and chicken still add up to the best way
I know of to hurry a cold on its way...
